languages.text:
The cyber-eagle gains +5 Agility and Perception and deals +100% more damage.
When the cyber-eagle starts to {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soar{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a Willpower resistance test with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of perplexed.
The cyber-eagle deals +100% more damage to perplexed targets.

The cyber-eagle gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +100% more damage.
When the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
The cyber-eagle deals +100% more damage to perplexed targets.
languages.original_text:
Киберорел получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и наносит на 100% больше урона.
Когда он поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}, враги на соседних клетках выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получают +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}.
Киберорел наносит на 100% больше урона целям в замешательстве.

languages.text:
Siber kartal, +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliği kazanır. +%100 daha fazla hasar verir.
Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başladığında bitişiğindeki düşmanlar +20 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} birikimine maruz kalırlar.
Siber kartal, şaşkın hedeflere +%100 daha fazla hasar verir.

Siber kartal {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başladığında bitişiğindeki düşmanlar +20 bonusa sahip bir İrade direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde +1 şaşkınlık birikimine maruz kalırlar.
Siber kartal, şaşkın hedeflere +%100 daha fazla hasar verir.

languages.text:
La ciberáguila recibe +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} e inflige un +100 % de daño adicional.
Cuando la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleva{/g}, los enemigos adyacentes deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una bonificación de +20 para no sufrir +1 acumulación del efecto {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}.
La ciberáguila inflige un +100 % de daño adicional contra objetivos perplejos.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +100% more damage.
When the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
The cyber-eagle deals +100% more damage to perplexed targets.

traits.locale_text:
La ciberáguila recibe +5 de Agilidad y Percepción e inflige un +100 % de daño adicional.
Cuando la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleva{/g}, los enemigos adyacentes deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una bonificación de +20 para no sufrir +1 acumulación del efecto perplejo.
La ciberáguila inflige un +100 % de daño adicional contra objetivos perplejos.

languages.text:
生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高5点，造成的伤害提高100%。
当生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，所有邻近敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+20加值，若未能通过检定，则会获得1层困惑效果。
生化猎鹰对处于{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}状态的目标造成的伤害提高100%。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +100% more damage.
When the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
The cyber-eagle deals +100% more damage to perplexed targets.

traits.locale_text:
生化猎鹰的敏捷、感知提高5点，造成的伤害提高100%。
当生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，所有邻近敌人都需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中获得+20加值，若未能通过检定，则会获得1层困惑效果。
生化猎鹰对处于困惑状态的目标造成的伤害提高100%。

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und verursacht +100 % Schaden.
Beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, müssen Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Bonus von +20 bestehen, um nicht mit +1 Stapel "{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}" belegt zu werden.
Der Cyber-Adler fügt verblüfften Zielen +100 % mehr Schaden zu.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +100% more damage.
When the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
The cyber-eagle deals +100% more damage to perplexed targets.

traits.locale_text:
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +5 Beweglichkeit und Wahrnehmung und verursacht +100 % Schaden.
Beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, müssen Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft mit einem Bonus von +20 bestehen, um nicht mit +1 Stapel "Verblüfft " belegt zu werden.
Der Cyber-Adler fügt verblüfften Zielen +100 % mehr Schaden zu.

languages.text:
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +5 et inflige +100 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle prend son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}, les ennemis adjacents doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, ils subissent 1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.
Le cyber-aigle inflige +100 % de dégâts aux cibles sous l'effet Perplexité.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +100% more damage.
When the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
The cyber-eagle deals +100% more damage to perplexed targets.

traits.locale_text:
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'Agilité et de Perception de +5 et inflige +100 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle prend son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}, les ennemis adjacents doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, ils subissent 1 cumul de l'effet Perplexité.
Le cyber-aigle inflige +100 % de dégâts aux cibles sous l'effet Perplexité.

languages.text:
サイバーイーグルの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+5され、与えるダメージが+100%上昇する。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}上昇した{/g}場合、隣接する敵は+20のボーナスで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると+1スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}を受ける。
サイバーイーグルは混乱状態のターゲットに+100%のダメージを与える。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +100% more damage.
When the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, adjacent enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
The cyber-eagle deals +100% more damage to perplexed targets.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーイーグルの敏捷性と認知力が+5され、与えるダメージが+100%上昇する。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:d8ae4229d77d444fa3bff7e2817541b3}上昇した{/g}場合、隣接する敵は+20のボーナスで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると+1スタックの混乱を受ける。
サイバーイーグルは混乱状態のターゲットに+100%のダメージを与える。

サイバーイーグルは混乱状態のターゲットに+100%のダメージを与える。

Когда он поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}, враги на соседних клетках выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получают +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}.

Киберорел наносит на 100% больше урона целям в замешательстве.
